alert.note: Alert for Mahnomen; Norman; West Becker (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 3:14PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Norman, southwestern Mahnomen and northwestern Becker Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 313 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout 8 miles east of Hitterdal, or 18 miles northwest of Detroit Lakes, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts up to 50 mph, and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated, funnel cloud on webcam. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Waubun, Ogema and Flom. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
